CustomField.defaultValue:
"a) The offer is for total quantity, if partial quantity is ordered, we reserve the right to accept or reject the order." + "
b) Production and Delivery time is given considering current mill booking position; A firm delivery schedule will be mutually discussed & agreed upon at the time of contract signing." + "
c) Any amendments of a.m. conditions must be subject to prior approval."
CustomField.label: Additional Terms
